section.title: Support us
section.description: Do you want to be part of this project and help change the lives of children in indigenous communities? You can support us in many ways:

money.title: Money
money.description:
You can send financial donations from $5,000COP through Vaki or Nequi by scanning the QR code you find here.
The money raised will be invested in the purchase of items for the library that will be donated on the day of the event.

items.title: Items
items.description:
Donate educational items, books, toys, clothing, or school supplies.
To coordinate delivery (in the city of Medellín-Colombia) send us an email to guardianesancestralesdev@gmail.com or send us a message through Instagram
Find here a list of ideas of things you can donate.

sponsorship.title: Sponsorship
sponsorship.description:
We are looking for companies that wish to sponsor us!
Contact us through guardianesancestralesdev@gmail.com to find out about sponsorship plans.

event.title: Guardianes Ancestrales
event.intro: An event designed for the boys and girls of La Guajira, Colombia.
event.description: The goal of this event is to improve access to education and provide tools to strengthen the academic and socio-emotional skills of children in this community. This April 27, we will have a day of interactive workshops and we will deliver donations.
event.donate: Be part of this event through your donations.

donations.question: Where can I send donations?
donations.answer: You can bring donations to the technology events we are present at, we will announce them on our Instagram. You can also send them to various physical addresses in Medellín-Colombia, write to us on our Instagram or email and we will coordinate the delivery.

hygiene.question: Can I donate personal hygiene products?
hygiene.answer: Yes, with the exception of menstrual cups, you can donate any personal hygiene product.

clothes1.question: Can I donate used clothes?
clothes1.answer: Yes, if the garment is in good condition.

clothes2.question: Can I donate clothes for different ages?
clothes2.answer: Yes, you can also donate adult clothing.

books1.question: Can I donate just one book?
books1.answer: Of course! All help adds up, if you have a book, a notebook that you don't use, a calculator, a shirt, each element adds up.

books2.question: What type of books can I donate?
books2.answer: All types of books, the objective is to give a library for the children since they do not have access to this type of educational material, some ideas are: mathematics books, science, technology, literature, educational material so that children learn to read and write, dictionaries.

toys.question: Can I donate toys?
toys.answer: Yes, we receive new or used toys that are in good condition.

money.question: Can I donate money?
money.answer: Yes, no matter the value, your contribution can change lives. We have several alternatives for monetary donations, you can donate through our Vaki or Nequi using our QR code.

hero.subtitle: Strengthening the future of the Wayuu indigenous community through education and tradition.

story.title: The Wayuú
story.intro: The Wayuú, or Guajiros, are the largest indigenous group in Colombia, mostly located in La Guajira and with an estimated population of 380,000 people.
story.description: Only 11% of this community lives within urban areas, which means that access to education is limited. Guardianes Ancestrales is an initiative that seeks to close these educational gaps.
